description: Create, manage, and distribute digital forms with easy signature collection. Professional form management system with public sharing links and real-time tracking.

home.description: Simple Forms - Create professional forms from templates, distribute via public links, and collect signatures easily. Start managing your forms today.

signin.description: Sign in to your Simple Forms account to manage your forms, view submissions, and track signatures.

dashboard.description: Your dashboard overview - manage forms, view recent submissions, and access all your form templates in one place.

forms.description: Browse and manage all your forms. Create new forms from templates, share public links, and track submissions.

form_detail.description: View form details, manage submissions, and share your form via public link for signature collection.

form_create.description: Create a new form from available templates. Customize fields and generate a shareable link for signature collection.

form_edit.description: Edit your form settings, update fields, and manage distribution options.

templates.description: Browse available form templates. Choose from pre-designed forms to quickly create and deploy your documents.

user.description: Manage your profile settings, preferences, and account information.

submitted.description: Form submitted successfully. Thank you for completing this form.

accessibility_statement.description: Information about accessibility features and compliance

manage_cookies.description: Manage your cookie preferences and settings

cookies_policy.description: Our policy on cookies and tracking technologies

privacy_policy.description: How we collect, use, and protect your personal information

terms_of_service.description: Terms and conditions for using our service
